description: This file implements socket-based logging functionalities, including socket initialization for UNIX domain and INET sockets, and a packet receiving loop that processes incoming log packets. It is part of a PAL logging module that facilitates local UNIX and network-based UDP socket communication for logging purposes.

methods.name: INT32 PAL_log_init_local_unix_udp_socket(IN CHAR * socket_addr_path_this_end,OUT INT32 * unix_socket)
methods.description: Initializes a local UNIX domain UDP socket bound to a specified socket address path.

methods.name: INT32 PAL_log_init_local_unix_udp_socket_to_addr(IN CHAR * socket_addr_path_other_end,OUT struct sockaddr_un * socket_addr_other_end)
methods.description: Prepares a sockaddr_un structure with the specified socket address path for later socket operations.

methods.name: INT32 PAL_log_init_inet_udp_socket(IN UINT16 port,OUT INT32 * udp_socket)
methods.description: Creates and binds a UDP socket to a specified network port.

methods.name: INT32 PAL_log_init_inet_udp_socket_to_addr(IN ULONG socket_ip_addr_other_end,IN UINT16 port,OUT struct sockaddr_in * socket_addr_other_end)
methods.description: Fills in a sockaddr_in structure with provided IP address and port for socket connection.

methods.name: VOID PAL_log_recv_and_process_packets(IN socket_info_t * socket_info_array,IN INT32 socket_count)
methods.description: Continuously waits for incoming packets on multiple sockets, demultiplexes them based on socket type, and invokes associated packet handler functions.

ctags.name: PAL_log_init_inet_udp_socket_to_addr
ctags.signature: (IN ULONG socket_ip_addr_other_end,IN UINT16 port,OUT struct sockaddr_in * socket_addr_other_end)
